1.name: Daniel Monastersky
1.title: Developer Advocate
1.shortBio: Mete is a Developer Advocate at Google, currently focused on helping developers with Google Cloud...
1.bio: Mete is a Developer Advocate at Google, currently focused on helping developers with Google Cloud Platform. As a long-time Java and a recent C# developer, he likes to compare the two ecosystems. Prior to Google, he worked at Microsoft, Skype, Adobe, EMC, and Nokia building apps and services on various web, mobile and cloud platforms. Originally from Cyprus, he currently lives in Greenwich, not too far away from the prime meridian.

2.name: Jorge Cano
2.title: Angular Developer Expert
2.bio: Después de más de 9 años desarrollando, Jorge es un full stack developer avocado a las tecnologías en javascript. Hoy en dia Jorge es Director de “departamento de nuevas tecnologías” en el cual prueba y decide qué tecnologías utilizar para brindar el mejor servicio performance y seguridad con Angular / Angular 2 / Firebase y otras tecnologías de punta… Profesor de varios cursos relacionados a javascript, Google Developer Expert en tecnologías web y Angular Developer Expert , speaker internacional, y escritor de artículos técnicos.

3.name: Alejandro Oviedo
3.title: Senior Developer Evangelist Connected Home
3.shortBio: Alejandro es un desarrollador que disfruta aprender cosas nuevas. Le encanta la educación, la electrónica, el Open Source y los eventos enfocados en la comunidad. También ayuda a organizar NodeConf Argentina y el meetup de Node de Buenos Aires
3.bio: Alejandro es un desarrollador que disfruta aprender cosas nuevas. Le encanta la educación, la electrónica, el Open Source y los eventos enfocados en la comunidad. También ayuda a organizar NodeConf Argentina y el meetup de Node de Buenos Aires

4.name: German Kuber
4.title: Software Engineer
4.shortBio: Rustem is working at Google for last 8 years. Was in Search and Android teams. Big fan of perform...
4.bio: Rustem is working at Google for last 8 years. Was in Search and Android teams. Big fan of performance optimizations.

5.name: Nicolás Bello Camilletti
5.title: Full-Stack Developer (C# y node.js) en Southworks, Microsoft MV
5.shortBio: Full-Stack Developer (C# y node.js) en Southworks, Microsoft MVP
5.bio: Nicolás es Ingeniero en Informática y Licenciado en Sistemas. Trabaja como Full-Stack Developer en Southworks. Aparte de esto, es Microsoft MVP. Normalmente trabaja con las últimas tecnologías especialmente relacionadas con Cloud Computing y Web Development usando C# y Node.js. Además organiza los meetups de Cloud Computing, Net-Baires y ASP.NET Community Standup LATAM.

6.name: Ignacio Anaya
6.title: Technical Evangelist
6.shortBio: Angular Google Developer Expert. International speaker and trainer.  Enjoy running AngularLabs London.
6.bio: Angular Google Developer Expert. I am a Computer Science Engineer specialised in Web. International speaker and trainer. I am an Angular fanboy and a community activist fighting for the JavaScript revolution. I have lived and worked for all sorts of companies in Germany, Brazil, UK and Spain. I am always up for a good challenge. I enjoy running AngularLabs London, mentoring students, participating in the community, giving talks and writing technical articles at Medium.

7.name: Eze Sculli
7.title: Developer Relations Program Manager
7.shortBio: TEDx speaker, Slovak Forbes 30-under-30, IT auditor for AIESEC International & TOP 5 Student Entrepreneurs in Slovakia.
7.bio:
Right now he is a passionate Googler helping developers and companies in South CEE to be more successful and profitable.

He co-founded and lead several StartUPs such as Venzeo.com, TrashOut.ngo, Matura.sk and Stuzkova.EU.

He is TEDx speaker, Slovak Forbes 30-under-30, IT auditor for AIESEC International & TOP 5 Student Entrepreneurs in Slovakia. He gets things done.

8.name: Hernan Liendo
8.title: Android Tech Lead
8.shortBio: 3x rockstar of DevFest Ukraine stage. Android GDE. Co-organizer of GDG Krakow.
8.bio: Mateusz lives in Krakow, holds a membership in the Google Developer Expert program for Android. Works as an Android Tech Lead at IG. Co-organizer of GDG Krakow community meetups. Fresh dad of twins. For the third time at DevFest Ukraine.

9.name: Leonardo Pittelli
9.title: Ingeniero en informática. Google Developer Expert para cloud. Hace varios años trabajando como web developer con foco en frontend, performance y optimización.
9.shortBio: Ingeniero en informática. Google Developer Expert para cloud. Hace varios años trabajando como web developer con foco en frontend, performance y optimización.
9.bio: Soy fanático de las tecnologías web. Trabajo desarrollando soluciones web y mobile hace varios años, con gran foco en la experiencia de usuario.He conducido equipos de desarrollo, tomando decisiones tecnológicas y fomentando la innovación a través de diferentes iniciativas.Me divierte descubrir nuevas tecnologías, elegir la más adecuada para cada proyecto y compartir conocimiento y experiencias con los demás.Además, soy Ingeniero en informática de la UBA y Google Developer Expert para cloud.

10.name: Mati Molina
10.title: Front-End Engineer
10.shortBio: Fighting for 60FPS on Web. GDE on Web Technologies. Co-organizer of GDG Krakow.
10.bio: Konrad is a front-end developer at Brainly, Google Developer Expert for Web Technologies and co-organizer of Google Developers Group in Krakow. Over the years he worked for various startups, consultancies and software houses building websites, hybrid apps and internal tools. After work, he develops Chrome extensions, experiments with various front-end technologies, gives presentations and runs workshops.

11.name: Mike Dorka
11.title: Founder
11.shortBio: Founder and co-organiser of GDG Basel. Worked in Defence & Aeronautics, Finance & Consulting industries.
11.bio: Jean-Baptiste Clion (AKA JB) is a senior cloud engineer working with Google Technologies since 2007.  He is the founder and co-organiser of GDG Basel, Switzerland. Jean-Baptiste worked in various industries such as Defence & Aeronautics, Finance & Consulting. In his last position, JB was Google Practice Lead at Capgemini Switzerland, he is now co-founding a startup dedicated to Progressive Web Apps solutions relying on cloud technologies.

12.name: Yury Camacho
12.title: CTO
12.shortBio: Paul is CTO and co-founder of Pixplicity, Holland's leading Android-specific consulting and app-b...
12.bio: Paul is CTO and co-founder of Pixplicity, Holland's leading Android-specific consulting and app-building company. He applies his knowledge of Java, Android and Linux in Pixplicity to develop high-quality apps and provide technical solutions for customers such as Mercedes-Benz, Nestlé, De Telegraaf, AGIS and De Consumentenbond.

13.name: Fran Kalaidyjan
13.title: Code Monkey
13.shortBio: Became a mobile developer after long run as a backend developer. Because of age, holding senior p...
13.bio: Became a mobile developer after long run as a backend developer. Because of age, holding senior positions from the day one as an Android programmer. Serial hackathon winner, or at least contender ;-)

14.name: Hernán Rajchert
14.title: Ing. Informático, CTO en Acamica
14.bio: Su hobby es coleccionar hobbies, bajista, jardinero orgánico, cultivador de hongos y comediante de standup fracasado. Developer de pequeño, Hernán estudió electrónica en la secundaria e informática en la facultad. Trabajó en diferentes start ups, ahora trabaja como CTO en Acamica, una academia online interactiva para aprender a programar.

15.name: Mariano Vazquez
15.title: Data Scientist
15.shortBio: Data scientist at one of the biggest fashion communities, STYLIGHT. Data analysis and visualisati...
15.bio:
Data scientist at one of the biggest fashion communities, STYLIGHT. Data analysis and visualisation hobbyist, working on problems not only in working time, but in free time for fun and personal data visualisations.

Speaker at different conferences: Berlin Buzzwords 2014, ApacheCon Europe 2014, Puppet Camp London 2015, Munich Developer Camp, Berlin Buzzwords 2015, Tableau Conference on Tour - Berlin 2015, Budapest BI forum 2015, CrunchConf 2015, FOSDEM 2016, PyData Amsterdam 2016

17.name: Eduardo Casarero
17.title: Co-Founder
17.shortBio: GDG Prague organizer. Android and Dart enthusiast. Co-founder of a company called Juicymo.
17.bio:
GDE (Google Developer Expert) for Dart. Jana is a passionate developer and modern web and mobile technology evangelist. She is an event organiser for GDG Prague, where she arranges events for developers including public lectures, code labs and hackathons – covering a wide range of subjects including technologies Dart or Android. She loves to help other developers and spread the knowledge about these technologies. 

Jana co-founded a company called Juicymo, where she works on juicy apps and products and teaches at Unicorn College.

16.name: Dmytro Danylyk
16.title: Senior Android Developer
16.shortBio: First Android GDE in Ukraine. Frequent speaker on tech conferences.
16.bio: Dmytro is a developer, writer, speaker. He live in Lviv - a quaint and beautiful city. He is passionate about android and flat design. Currently Dmytro works for a startup Timee where he develop Android application and he love what he do.

19.name: David Vávra
19.title: Founder/CEO/Android Lead
19.shortBio: Founder and CEO of Step Up Labs. Android GDE.
19.bio: David is a Google Developer Expert for Android. He is a CEO now, but he still finds time for diving deep into Android architecture. He currently focuses on Firebase for Android. He loves open-source and gadgets like Android Wear or Android TV. He is the core organiser of GDG Prague events.

18.name: Jakub Škvára
18.title: Frontend engineer
18.shortBio: Jakub is a front-end engineer at Shipito interested in modern web frameworks, libraries and tools...
18.bio: Jakub is a front-end engineer at Shipito interested in modern web frameworks, libraries and tools. Jakub is also a member of GDG Prague and GDG ČVUT in the Czech republic.

21.name: Sergiy Mokienko
21.title: Android Team Lead
21.shortBio: Sergiy is an android developer that has experience from building apps from scratch to developing...
21.bio: Sergiy is an android developer that has experience from building apps from scratch to developing android based sdks and libraries for other applications. He has more than 10 applications successfully published on Google Play. Former GDG chapter lead in Nikolaev. Currently he is leading a team that builds broker software for 60+ different brokers.

20.name: Valentyn Shybanov
20.title: Software Engineer/Country Manager
20.shortBio: Google Developer Expert on Cloud. Co-organizer of GDG Kyiv-Center.
20.bio: Google Developer Expert on Cloud. Co-organizer of GDG Kyiv-Center.

23.name: Michael Pustovit
23.title: Senior Android Developer
23.shortBio: Michael is a software engineer at Stanfy. He is KPI FICT Computer Science graduate and has 4+ yea...
23.bio: Michael is a software engineer at Stanfy. He is KPI FICT Computer Science graduate and has 4+ years in Android development. Michael moderates KyivAndroidDevClub. Besides programming, he is a capoeira player.

22.name: Ihor Dvoretskyi
22.title: Deployment Engineer
22.shortBio: OpenStack Foundation member, Kubernetes upstream contributor and OpenStack special interest group lead in Kubernetes Community.
22.bio:
Ihor is an Operations Engineer at Mirantis with a huge experience working in IT companies, where he was responsible for projects tightly bound to Cloud computing and Linux systems. He is deeply interested in the OpenStack cloud platform, other Cloud technologies, especially the Open Source projects.

Also, Ihor acts as the OpenStack Foundation member, Kubernetes upstream contributor, and OpenStack special interest group lead in Kubernetes Community, working intensely on the questions and abilities, related to the OpenStack and Kubernetes collaboration and integration.

25.name: Constantine Mars
25.title: Senior Android Developer
25.shortBio: Constantine is Senior Android Developer at DataArt and GDG Dnipro Organizer. He was speaker on De...
25.bio: Constantine is Senior Android Developer at DataArt and GDG Dnipro Organizer. He was speaker on DevFest, multiple IT NonStop events and GDG meetups. Constantine is interested mainly in Android Wear platform, RxJava, best practices in applications Architecture, and sometimes cross-platform mobile development with Xamarin.

24.name: Anton  Minashkin
24.title: Lead Software Developer
24.shortBio: Android developer, currently works at EPAM. Have experience in both server and mobile side develo...
24.bio: Android developer, currently works at EPAM. Have experience in both server and mobile side development. All my free time I spend on the endless search of silver bullets, perfect architectures and holy wars.

27.name: Pablo Soifer
27.title: Tiene 10 años de experiencia como QA y hoy está en Belatrix como Test Automation Expert
27.shortBio: Tiene 10 años de experiencia como QA y hoy está en Belatrix como Test Automation Expert
27.bio: Test Automation Expert en Belatrix Software y es Analista en Sistemas. A lo largo de su trayectoria laboral, Pablo llevó a cabo tanto el diseño, como la escritura e implementación de nuevos frameworks de automatización en compañías de diferentes rubros. Como QA Automation SME, ha tenido la responsabilidad de realizar el mantenimiento de los frameworks de automatización de pruebas. Además, fruto de su experiencia en tecnología en general, y en calidad en particular, ha tenido la oportunidad de brindar capacitaciones en múltiples ocasiones, teniendo muy buena recepción.

26.name: Carlos Cadenas
26.title: Tiene 8 años de experiencia como QA y hoy está en Belatrix como Test Automation SR
26.shortBio: Tiene 8 años de experiencia como QA y hoy está en Belatrix como Test Automation SR
26.bio: Test Automation SR en Belatrix Software y está estudiando Ingeniería Informática en la Universidad del Salvador. Empieza su carrera hace 8 años como desarrollador y QA.  Durante estos años ha estado aplicando pruebas de automatización con Selenium en varios proyectos en Java, Ruby, C#, siendo Python la tecnología con mayor experiencia y conocimientos. A lo largo de su trayectoria laboral,  desarrolló el diseño,  la escritura e implementación de nuevos frameworks de automatización. En Belatrix está integrando esfuerzo de diferentes áreas para crear un framework de automation que corra en Integración Continua para asegurar la calidad en cada commit.
